name: Catasrandom
description:
Catasrandom is a turn-based puzzle game. Help Loaf Cat reach the cake before you run out of turns in the +10 brain-teasing puzzle levels. Your turns are a valuable ressource – Use your brain power to help Loaf Cat get some yummy cake and overcome CATastrophic hurdles on their home planet Nyaturn with lots of RANDOMNESS!

To play the game, just download and unpack the zip-file and run the executable!

We hope you enjoy our puzzles! :3
We'd absolutely love to see your thoughts and feedback in the comments.
We gathered the experience from the previous year's GMTK Game Jam and know-how from our studies from the Univeristy of Applied Sciences Upper Austria, Campus Hagenberg(https://www.fh-ooe.at/campus-hagenberg/) to develop prototypes for our game mechanics! All assets,code, music and animations have been created within the 48-hours game jam.

We are a 4-person team:
– Elias (aka. ElitoGame), Unity, Programming, Game Design, UI
– Kevin (aka. FairySworder), Game Design, Character Design, Animation, UI, Logo, Social Media
– Mario (aka. Hector), Game Design, Character Design, Animation, UI
– Thomas (aka. Mentalist), Game Design, Animation, Music

Programmes used:
– Unity as Game Engine
– GitHub for Version Control
– Aseprite for animations, visual assets and logo
– Adobe Photoshop for visual assets and sketches
– Adobe After Effects for the intro and outro sequences
– FL Studio Mobile for music
– Discord for team coordination
